name: FMP - Full Metal Parking
description:
Welcome to
FULL METAL PARKING This is all about parking backwards! But be careful. it is harder than it sounds! . Controlls A/D <-/-> - Steer the car R - Reload Level Alt+F4 - Instant Win . As an extra challenge this game has been made with color blind people in mind! #GamingIsForEveryone . Programming: Max (Narrenschlag) Graphic Design: Max (Narrenschlag) Game/Concept Design: Jonas, Max (Narrenschlag) Music: Simone Mastrangelo, Matteo Della Millia . For the full version with leaderboard support, music and more levels download the desktop build! Leave a review in the comments! :)) This project has been conceptualized and prototyped during the BlackThornProd GameJam in January 2021.
